message.content:
I need to identify the line item that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, which is depreciation.

Looking at the income statement provided, I can see a specific line item labeled "Depreciation" with a value of 45753.36.

Depreciation represents the systematic allocation of the cost of tangible assets over their useful lives, which is exactly what the task is asking for.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '45753.36'} }
```
